scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir -p build/js build/css && uglifyjs js/info.js js/config.js js/dom.js js/rng.js js/utils.js js/song.js js/migration.js js/save-move.js js/state.js js/audio.js js/guess.js js/modals.js js/styles.js js/ui.js --compress sequences=true,conditionals=true,booleans=true,dead_code=true,unused=true,if_return=true,join_vars=true --mangle toplevel=true --enclose --output build/js/bundle.min.js && html-minifier --minify-js --collapse-whitespace -o build/index.html index.html && ./node_modules/.bin/css-minify -f css/bundle.css -o build/css/ && mv build/css/bundle.min.css build/css/bundle.css
